Guwahati Mini Marathon

Meet Shiva Thapa

Register Now

The Guwahati Mini Marathon (10km run)
Sunday, 16 October.

The chief guest of this event is Shiva Thapa.

Shiva Thapa is an Olympian boxer from Guwahati, Assam, India.

Shiva Thapa receiving the Arjuna award from the Hon'ble President of India.

Description

We want this event to be a platform for everyone to interact with Shiva Thapa and become inspired to do something for his/her country and community.

On Spot Registration

Students - Rs.50

Others - Rs.100

Venue: Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium, Guwahati.

Time: 4:30 a.m. for registration.

Marathon will start from 5:30 a.m. onwards.

TRACK

Length: The track is of 10 km.

Starting point: Nehru Stadium, Guwahati.

End point: Don Bosco School, Panbazar.

Cash Prizes and Trophies to be won.
